Love Anthony William, the Medical Medium.  I have all of his books:  Medical Medium, Life Changing Foods, Thyroid Healing, Liver Rescue and his latest Celery Juice.  I also have been following him for years.  He is the modern day Edgar Cayce.  He gets his information from Spirit, much the same as Cayce did but he gets it a little different than Cayce did.  He has helped heal thousands of people with various illnesses.  If you are looking for a new juicer, Anthony recommends the Omega Juicers.  This is the brand that I have and I highly recommend it also.  Canadian Tire has a sale on their juicers from time to time.  Also, for those who don't have or want to buy a juicer, Anthony recommends blending the celery in a high speed blender and then straining it through a nut milk bag or cheese cloth.  As far as the funky taste, Anthony says that the taste usually depends upon what kind of toxins the body is trying to remove and the taste usually gets better over time. Also, if you buy celery juice from a grocery store or health food store, make sure that it was freshly squeezed and not trucked in from somewhere else because it will  have been pasteurized (high pressure pasteurization) and will have no benefits because the pasteurization process kills off the enzymes.  Fresh is best.

I believe that organic produce still has pesticides. They‚Äôre natural. While traditional farmers can use up to 900 different pesticides. 95% of folks believe that organic means no pesticides. Not true. Their crops are vulnerable to the same critters as traditional farmland. Which means, fungicides and some 20 other approved organic pesticides. According to the National Center for Food and Agriculture Policy, the two top organic fungicides are copper and sulfur. So it‚Äôs not if produce has pesticides, it‚Äôs what type. It‚Äôs origin.
